output_list.description: The mintToken function allows the owner to increase the total supply of the token arbitrarily, which is a security vulnerability.
The freezeAccount function allows the owner to freeze an arbitrary user's asset, aka the 'tradeTrap' issue.
The _transfer function allows a user to transfer an arbitrary amount of tokens to an arbitrary address, aka the 'transferAny' issue.
The sell function allows a user to sell an arbitrary amount of tokens, aka the 'sellAny' issue.
The buy function allows a user to buy an arbitrary amount of tokens, aka the 'buyAny' issue.
